name: Parasite Days
description: Parasite Days is an adventure game developed by zxima.LLC. After being awoken with a parasitic entity on one arm and a smartwatch on the other, the player—otherwise known as Subject 4134, is tasked with surviving for as long as possible and collecting data for the Foundation. As Subject 4134, you're able to purchase various items (including food, injections, and miscellaneous items), work part-time jobs, chat with the parasite and Watchio, or work against the Foundation by establishing communications with outside forces.
